Metadata.title: Helpest - Non-Profit Charity Organization
Metadata.description: Join us in making a difference. Support our mission to provide education, healthcare, and hope to communities in need.

TopBar.welcome: Welcome To Helpest Non Profit Charity

FeaturedCauseCard.title: We start by listening to communities
FeaturedCauseCard.description: Poverty is the act of extending love and kindness to others which is a conscious act but the decision is made by the heart.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We are committed to serving humanity everywhere, without any racial, religious, or ideological discrimination, through education, healthcare services, and social inclusion, in a way that strengthens human dignity and achieves sustainable development.

objectives.title: Objectives
items: To create an appropriate environment for people with disabilities through educational, rehabilitative, healthcare, and social programs, projects, and approved technologies.
To support marginalized and most vulnerable groups and integrate them into society.
To build strategic partnerships with local and international organizations to achieve sustainable development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To become a solid bridge of hope and a globally leading institution in relief work, development, and rehabilitation, through innovative initiatives and effective partnerships.

targetGroups.title: Target Groups
items: Patients and people with physical or intellectual disabilities.
Individuals affected by wars, disasters, and famines.
Underprivileged families and those who have lost their primary provider.

slides.subtitle: Better Future For All
slides.title: Together, we can make the <highlight>world</highlight> better.

AboutSection.subtitle: About Us
AboutSection.title: Who We Are
AboutSection.descriptionLead: We are the <highlight>Bridges of Hope Association</highlight> for Development and Rehabilitation, a non-profit humanitarian organization officially registered and licensed in Turkey and Palestine.
AboutSection.descriptionBody: We strive to serve, develop, and rehabilitate individuals in areas affected by disasters, wars, conflicts, and poverty-stricken countries, adhering to principles of honesty, responsibility, and justice.
AboutSection.quote: With humanity wherever it may be… dignity preserved and lives rebuilt.
